title: Nichiren - Nhat Lien
description: Vietnamese Buddhist restaurant. The kitchen seems to be in the Art Deco house and the restaurant is in the glass-walled newer section with views and outdoor seating area. Nice atmosphere with crockery, rattan chairs, glass-top tables, fireplace, soft French, English, and Vietnamese music, wall-hangings & sculptures. Non smoking inside. Directions: in the same street as the Crazy House on the same side of street down a few blocks.
